title: VSCode Icons Extension
description: Configure which icon groups to display in the file browser

enableLanguageIcons.title: Programming Language Icons
enableLanguageIcons.description: Enable icons for programming languages (Python, JavaScript, TypeScript, Java, C/C++, Rust, Go, Ruby, PHP, etc.)

enableWebIcons.title: Web Development Icons
enableWebIcons.description: Enable icons for web files (HTML, CSS, SCSS, SASS, LESS, Vue, Svelte)

enableDataIcons.title: Data Format Icons
enableDataIcons.description: Enable icons for data files (JSON, YAML, TOML, XML, CSV)

enableConfigIcons.title: Configuration File Icons
enableConfigIcons.description: Enable icons for config files (Dockerfile, .gitignore, package.json, requirements.txt, Makefile, etc.)

enableDocIcons.title: Documentation Icons
enableDocIcons.description: Enable icons for documentation files (Markdown, RST, TXT, PDF)

enableImageIcons.title: Image File Icons
enableImageIcons.description: Enable icons for image files (PNG, JPG, SVG, etc.)
